content.detailedDescription: I work for a local area medical service and my partner {which is a pilot may i add} and i were on our way back from an assignment when we both (who are sky watchers)noticed what we thought was mars and was unusually  bright. we were coming from the rural area which has little to no light pollution and just thought that is why it looked so bright.Well right beside it we noticed a simular object that was redish in color but appeared to be lower and moving in a absolut strait line to the west and getting closer and clearer still in a strait path but away from the brighter red mars like object. when i say mars like im speaking of the clear nights that you can see the red planet without a telescope. now my partner being a pilot said that he thought that it was a low flying plane that just left bush field with its red navigation light stuck in the on position givin it the redish color. as we pull up to the intersection  i notice the object start to slow and all of the sudden it stops in mid path and starts to get brighter and then it appeared to catch fire. i told him to look and i stated oh man that plane just caught on fire and he agreed to what i saw.  at that time we were looking more and more concerned at the incident we thought for sure was a plane that had caught on fire and was surely in trouble . at the intersection us looking up and out of the ambulance in a concerned fashion also caught the eye of the cars around us and they also started looking in the direction that we were looking and they also looking to be concerned. in the same fashion that the object appeared it started to reversed its action and turned back into the tight redish object we observed before. the object then started moving in the oppisite direction to the east in a steady speed and then all of the sudden it took off at a very high rate of speed back toward the other redish object covering around 12 inches of the skyline in about 3 seconds and all of the sudden the object does an abrubt 90 degree right angle and instantly moves out of sight . my partner and i both are speechles on the event that just happened and immediately pull into a parking lot and quickly get out to attempt to view the object further.At that time unable to explain what just happened we noticed the original bright mars like object had also dissapeared. confused and trying to figure out what we just saw we thought of all sorts of things that could explain the event that just occured from helicopters to planes to meteorites and him having knowledge of a vast assortment of aircraft ruled out every thing that we thought of due to the dilibrate movement , speed and the angle of the change of direction that it displayed and then the empty area of the sky that the whole event started in. i being a sceptic in this area have been left completely unable to explain this event. my partner and i both spent half the night trying to explain away the event and make sense of it. being unable to do that i have a whole different look on this area now and as interesting as it is i find it hard to wrap my mind around it. this event changed my whole outlook.
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Star like redish light  tranformed to a flarelike fire ball and transferred back to tight redish light.

content.detailedDescription: 7am i walked out of work to go home. i observed a strange "mark" in the sky at the horizon as the sun was about to begin rising. i couldn't tell if the "mark" was an oval cloud reflecting the rising sun or a stationary object. about 10 minutes later to the far right of the "mark" a bright light appeared and seemed to "swim" around in the sky like a fish. it was a ball that seemed to glow orange then back to a bright light then disappear. for 20 minutes i witnessed this with 2 co-workers. at one point 2 lights appeared and seemed to interact with each other then disappear. the entire episode was about 30 minuets, the lights overall reappeared about 5 times and the phenomena gradually decreased as the larger "mark" drifted farther east until out of sight. planes north of the phenomena from lax gave a great control comparative during the observation. these were not commercial air craft, they simply looked like firefly's in the atmosphere.
content.summary: Half moon (blimp) looking object stationary, a distance away from it orange satilite looking objects were apearing and flying around eachother then dissapearing

content.detailedDescription: My cousin was just outside her apartment, seen a beautiful day. something told her to take a pic with her camera phone. she sent me this picture, which i felt was a beautiful day light shot. she didn't see the object at the top until i sent her a message back telling her to not send me a photo-chop picture. i forgot that she doesn���t own a computer, so she can't fake this pic that i know of. please take a look at this pic for me, if it's a sun blot thru the lens let me know that to. also notice how the object cast a ring thru the sun. no sun blot does that, i���ve tried to prove to myself that this pic is a fake. but i can't prove that because even under magnification you can't see the sky thru the object.
content.summary: Daylight shot of a beautiful day

content.detailedDescription: My brother and we outside star gazing out to catch a shooting star.It is a common to see aleast one or two on a clear night. when it was about 12:30am is when the first flash i noticed. it was a flash of light neon green, or emerld green in color in the direction about 290 degress west, northwest sky.The second flash came about 7-10 minutes later same color was spoted by my brother in the south, southwest sky about 220 degrees,then again about 5 minutes later another flash this time in about 270 degrees due west. the fourth and final flash witnessed was about another 5-7 minututes from the last in about 240 degrees west southwest. all the flashes seen are fairly bright and appear very low on the horizion with a maxium of 40 degress to the highest point of illumination from the ground up and about 20 to 30 degress wide. the light that we were seeing seemed to have no point of origin,no brighter point threw out the flash itself.These lights are not the first time seeing them i have personally have witness these same flashes many times before but never to here a sound.
content.summary: Green flashes from on or just below the horizion

content.detailedDescription:
Noticed the objects coming from the east traveled south west the green  object seemed to be follwoing the blue object.  the blue object seemed to speed up and climbed or elevated then headed north west all the while it climbed a higher distance.  then the blue object seemed to be follwoing the green object. the colors of the blue object seem to turn from blue to green then white then red then green again. at this point the 1st green object was no where to be seen. then the object that was turning different colors climbed so high it was no longer visible.  this was seen by 11 sober individuals.

this time we were not able to take video or still pictures because objects were to high.
content.summary: 2 lights, green being followed by a blue light

content.detailedDescription:
Hi,
 a first for me. shortly after dark on the 21st of oct. 2010 i was going to close my gate when i saw 2 bright orange lights in the low western sky. i'm 69 years old and have never seen anything like this. they appeared to be over fern ridge lake west of eugene, oregon, about a mile from my position. they were stationery and after a few seconds were joined by a third light between the two. all three in a straight line horizontal to the ground. a few more seconds passed and all three slowly disappeared as if they were on a rheostat. as i continued to watch for a few more seconds they all three appeared again at a lower altitude and a little further southwest and closer together. i would guess they were no more than a few hundred feet in altitude. after a few more seconds they disappeared slowly and never re-appeared.When visible they were motionless. this was all in a matter of a minute or so. it was a clear night, stars visible, and a nearly full moon. there was no sound, and the lights appeared to be about 25% the size of the full moon.
content.summary: Bright orange lights

content.detailedDescription: It was approximately 11:07 pm est when my husband and i were out on our porch star gazing, and i noticed something moving overhead (heading east), and my first inclination was to think it was a flock of geese in v formation, but realized it was a triangular shaped craft, dim, with lights on each side  outlining the shape.  it was moving pretty rapidly.  i can't really give any specifics on how high up it really was, but it definitely did not seem too high up to me.  i saw the object for a few seconds, then i lost sight of it. it also seemed to be a decent size.  i apologize for not being able to be more specific, but i am bad at gauging these kinds of things.  there is absolutely no way i could mistake this to be anything else. it stayed in a perfectly triangular formation, and it moved as one large unit.
content.summary: Saw a perfect triangular shaped object fly directly overhead at a fairly rapid speed

content.detailedDescription:
This happened many years ago, and i have always felt i should have reported the sighting then, but i have always tried to convince myself that what i witnessed was not unique.

i was a greyhoung bus driver back then. this happened about 1993-1995. i was on a latenight run between phoenix and las vegas. as i recall i had left kingman and was travelling across the desert on a 2-lane highway that is very remote, thin, and a very windy roadway.

my wife was on this trip with me and she was aleep in the seat behind me. it was about 4am. i thought that all the passengers behind me were asleep. on these nighttime runs they usually are.

as i came up over a rise in the highway and began coming down the other side, i noticed up ahead and on the right side of the road 3 amber lights in a triangular shape. 2 lower and 1 about 15 feet above centered between the other two, like a pyramid (larger at the base).

the object(s) were hovering approx. 15' above the right side of the road. as i approached with the bus, i knew that the sight and configuration was unusual, but i kept approaching, trying to convince myself that i was seeing the rear end of a helicopter (that is the only way i could explain what i was seeing)

as we were about 30' from the object, it suddenly shot across the road in front of us and flew over next to a mountain, on the left. the object(s) accellerated from 0 to hundreds (perhaps thousands) of mph in a fraction of a second. i estimate the mountain that it shot over to to be 15 miles away and yet the object traversed the distance in (as i recall) a matter of 1 or 2 seconds.

i have never seen anything accellerate like this object did. 

as i said previously, i was trying to believe i was seeing a helicopter. the triangular lights did not turn, as a helicopter would, when they shot over next to the mountain. then the lights just hovered over there!

i heard a voice from the front right seat. a passenger was awake and witnessed the same sight that i just had. he said. "what do you think we just saw?

all i could say was, "i don't know!" neither of us mentioned our sighting again. i never thought to get his name. as i say, i never expected to see a ufo, i spent the susequent hours trying to convince myself it was conventional! although it could not have been.

i find it very strange to this day that i did not wake my wife up. i will always chastise myself for not stopping that bus and waking my passengers to experience the ufo. i chastise myself for not talking further with the passenger that saw the ufo with me. i should have at least got his name.

even stranger, we just kept on driving. the object(s) were still in sight, hovering next to that mountain until we drove out of sight.

i like to think that if i ever have a similar experience that i will investigate further. 

subsequent to this trip, about a year and a half later, i was pulling the same duty from phoenix to las vegas. same roads, i knew them well. when i arrived in las vegas and reported to dispatch, they asked why i was so late. somehow the trip had taken a 1 1/2 hours longer than usual. i can't explain it. and furthermore, i remember not being too concerned about it.
content.summary: Driving a greyhiound bus, i came on a triangular ufo hovering 15' above the highway i was travelling at 4 am.

content.detailedDescription: Went on back porch to get let dogs out and noticed low bright glowing amber light with appearent dome on top approaching from north heading towards me.Called to my brother inside to hurry outside to see object.Both watched as object went overhead on a slight curve to the south west.Ran inside to get my camera phone ,but was to late to capture object as it dissappeared in the distant sky .Object appeared to be glowing and at first thought it to be a meteor until we realized the object was moving as slow as a plane with a prop. and was completely silent as it passed.My brother thought it was a hot air balloon at first because he said it looked like it had a dome on top ,until it passed with the speed of a slow moving plane and no sound.I emmediatly called my sister to tell her and my older brother kept lookingh up saying "that was wierd"
content.summary: Slow moving bright amber light moving north to southwest that vanished

content.detailedDescription: I was outside looking north when i looked up and watched several star-  like things moving south.  got my husband and ask him if i was seeing things.  he became very still counted 5 moving (star-light objects)no blinking lights or different colors moving south.  i am very scared because as a child i saw one up close in the mid-60's. this is a serious matter please check out. thank you i hope other people saw or see this.
content.summary: Notified of sighting in n. houston-went outside looked to the north and saw

content.detailedDescription:
I was sitting outside in an open field around a fire pit with some friends, sunday night, 31oct2010, at approximately 9:20. we were in a field of a friend who lives south west of newtown, pa, bucks county. 
i was facing north. i  know which direction i was facing because i just finished playing with the go sky watch app on my iphone.  a  fireball the color of a bright green stoplight flashed in the sky and disappeared into the tree line.  my friend next to me looked at me in disbelief.  we were the only two who saw the object.  it was only visible for a second or two.
content.summary: Green fireball

content.detailedDescription:
Was travelling north on hwy pd when my wife and i saw what appeared to be a stationary orange light hovering in the sky. stopped my vehicle along side the road to get a better view. when i got out of my vehicle the light was moving in a southerly direction and more or less parallel to the road i was on. it wasn't moving very fast but i observed shortly after it passed my position that the light just seemed to disappear. not like it got so far away i couldn't see it anymore, but just disappeared.
it was a single, spherical orange light. it wasn't very bright, but somewhat subdued. it didn't blink, but maybe pulsated slightly and didn't make any sound that i could hear. the whole incident from the first moment i saw the light until i lost sight of it was approximately 2 minutes.

the exact location as determined by topographical mapping software is 42 degrees, 55.570 minutes n and 89 degrees, 31.689 minutes w. elevation of that location is 899ft above sea level. time of incident was 1:35 a.M., october 31, 2010. skies were clear and many stars along with a large crescent moon were visible. approximate temperature was 35 degrees fahrenheit. i had no alcohol or narcotics in my system. i was not impaired in any way. my wife also witnessed the light. there were no other vehicles on the road that i noticed when the light was visible.

i assume it was just a normal aircraft that i couldn't positively i.D.  because of the darkness and the angle of viewing i might have missed some features that would have given me a clue as to what it was. i'm not overly concerned of what i saw, just curious.
content.summary: Orange light in sky appeared stationary then started moving south then disappeared.

content.detailedDescription:
I was in the neighbors side yard with grandchildren, noticed a silvery/white object in the sky. i at first thought that it was a large white crane which we sometimes see but i watched the object for a sec.
then realized it's shape..... the object appeared to be aprox. 24 inches in diameter with a white dome. it was moving along a perfectly straight line heading south towards downtown houston. it made absolutely no sound at all
and continued across the sky at a medium speed. it was not moving fast. i was aprox. fifty feet from a grove of trees where i lost sight of it. i ran to a clearing in the driveway and looked in the direction it was traveling but saw nothing! i was the only person to see it. i first had asked..."what is that?" ....Then strained my eyes in disbelief as the full realization hit me.
content.summary: Metallic disc shaped object with white dome seen in north houston

content.detailedDescription:
March 21, 2009 (sent the following to a ufo group in ca or wa last year, no response)
approx. 8:30 pm est in mcmurray, pa 15317. overcast. 
drove out of driveway and noticed 4 lights in the sky that were revolving in a large circle. initially thought someone was having a party with strobe lights, but the temp was only about 50 degrees f. and there was no party outside. the four lights were revolving in a circular pattern parallel to the ground, but not obviously attached to one another. sometimes two would join and revolve together while the other two continued the revolutions. they were rarely perfectly symmetrical from one another revolving in a circle like shape. each orb was approximately 4��� in diameter. 

as i continued to drive slowly down our road the lights remained and moved ahead of me on the left side of the road over the houses and were approx. 5-6 stories above the ground. before i got to the main road i wanted to find out what would happen if i stopped. i turned off the car and radio and lights after opening the window to determine if i could hear anything. the four lights/orbs remained in place circling above the houses near the end of my street ��� where i had stopped. a few cars entered our subdivision and left it during the approx. 15 minutes i sat watching the lights, but the lights never varied or went away.
 
i had to go to cvs to get medication for my husband and decided that i couldn���t wait any longer. started the car, went to the stop light and crossed to go south on rt. 19. the lights crossed ahead of me and were now on the right side of the road. due to lots of streetlights and business lights on rt. 19 i was unable to see where the lights were and thought they might have disappeared. then i saw them again flying along side me at about the same height. when i arrived at cvs about 1 mile from home, the four orbs now were circling over the rear of cvs. 

i went inside, made my purchase and returned to my car ��� the orbs were still there circling. i was tempted to call someone from cvs out to see the lights, but wanted to keep it to myself because it was so fascinating.  i felt that i had been chosen for this experience and didn't want to share it. i returned home and could not see the lights on the return drive until i got to our subdivision again. again the lights were on the right side of the street (where they originally were when i went out). when i pulled in my driveway i called my husband outside. all i did was point to the sky and ask him what he saw. he saw lights spinning and there were four. 

by now it was about 8:55 pm/20:55 and i wanted to find out if i could get any closer to the lights so walked toward my neighbors��� houses where the lights were. they revolved in a clockwise messy circle (not obviously attached to anything and not a particularly round circle) and retained a constant speed. i could not determine the exact color, but they weren���t bright enough to be white so i thought perhaps bright blue or green. as i watched them and the clouds started to clear, i noticed that as a light/orb passed through clear sky, it virtually disappeared and reappeared once behind cloud cover. there was no light on the ground (no flashlight effect) from them. the color may have been blue since disappeared when passing through dark blue evening sky.
 
as i moved forward down our street toward the lights, they moved forward as well and appeared to keep a distance of two house lots between me and them. the clouds were breaking up and the lights disappeared more frequently with clear sky. i went inside at about 9:05 to check on my husband and when i came back out at 9:15, the sky was clear and there was no sign of the lights.
content.summary: Four lights revolving in a circle parallel to the ground that followed me from home to store and back

content.detailedDescription: I was riding the sand dunes in waynoka, oklahoma, at about 12:30am we stopped for a break near north camp, took off my helmet and noticed a star-like light drop out of its position and stop, so i point up to it to show my buddies but they really didn't care. i continued to watch it for about 15 minutes. it was straight east of me no closer than probably 20-30 miles, it changed colors constantly from blue-yellow-red-white with no blinking or strobing. i got back to camp and watched it for another 30-40 minutes, it was still in the sky when i went to bed. it pulled of some extraordinary maneuvers that no aircraft could have done and hovered in 1 spot. the manuevers were pulled off in a very small space. orions belt pointed straight down to the light the whole time. it was probably 15-20 degrees off the horizon.
content.summary: Brightest light in the sky changing colors

content.detailedDescription: I was just sitting doing my home work when i saw an od light thru the window above my neighborshouse i thought it was the street light goingcrazy , i went outside to look and it was a buetiful firey diamond with a unbelvible color of orange and red but more it was stunning silently no sound at all just hovering there.I got my sister and looked for the telescope but couldnt find it so we just stood there and watched and super fast it darted up and blinked before going into space.After the event i beleive in aliens and think i should of taken a picture of it.I will always cherish my memory and have a new veiw on things.
content.summary: The firey triangle

content.detailedDescription:
In 1965 i attended berwick academy, located in berwick, maine. 
on the evening of the ���event���, i had sat in on a seminar held at the academy about ���betty & barney hill!' yes, the 'hills' re: the 'heavily documented close encounter of a third kind' 'hills!' i would like to say that it was the 'hills' who were the guest speakers but...Alas, i can no longer recall. for many years, my recollection was that it was the 'hills' who spoke of their encounter...However, i am no longer sure. it might have been some other guest speaking on the subject. 
anyway, on with my story. just prior to the seminar being wrapped-up, myself & two (2) other students escaped the building in order to avoid the crowd. as a matter of note, i still recall the 1st & last name of one of my buddies and the 1st name of the other. as we walked down the faintly lit berwick street looking up at the stars, we were expressing our 'wonder' in reference to the 'hills' outrageous experience, as well as how cool it would be for there to really be other intelligent beings 'out there' & how neat it would be to see somethi...And then we saw it!!!  
off to the south, at perhaps a 45degree angle we saw a reddish-orange oval/football shaped light about the (apparent) size of the lincoln memorial (as immortalized on the u.S. penny) when held at arms length. this was not an earthly device! 
now understand...My father was a very high-ranking usaf officer and i had been around aircraft for most of my (albeit) young life. i knew 'air vehicles' fairly well and this one spotted, was only familiar considering the seminar that my friends and i had just attended! 
i thought that i knew what it was...But it just seemed too much of a bizarre coincidence. the object seemed to hold its position as we approached our dorm-house. i sent one friend into our dorm to get his camera & convinced the other to call a local air force base (pease?). i was extremely excited as one might imagine and did not avert my gaze from this object for even a micro-second while my friends were gone. the object 
appeared to be still holding it's position as my friend with his camera bounded out of our dorm. just before he turned around, i witnessed this object exhibit a few 'minute' dynamics and then it just zipped, blurred, vanished from my sight. my buddy was devastated. a moment later, my friend who said he was going to call an air force base came back out & said that whomever he had spoken to told him that as far as he knew, there was nothing unusual out there...He too was of course, devastated!
so, what could i do? my father was very strict & a hardcore usaf officer & patriot. he & i didn't seem to communicate very well. what is one to do? tell everyone and risk trouble from 'dad' and/or risk razzing from one's peers, subordinates & superiors? gaining a rep for being a bit 'off?' well, dad took care of a lot of that...He pulled me out of school prior to my graduation from the 9th grade and within a couple months, the entire family moved to europe. hummmm... long story short: i mentioned this event fairly seldom over the ensuing years because, what are ya gonna do? who's going to really listen? life goes on. i had things to do over in europe at the ages 0f 15-22, yes? well, 20yrs after the 'event' (almost an exact 20 yr anniversary date of my sighting), a know-it-all friend of mine casually mentions that there had been a mass-ufo sighting in the exeter new hampshire area back in 1965 or '66 and that it was documented. he then informed me that exeter new hampshire is about 30 miles from berwick maine. oh my god! i can't describe what my brain began doing at that moment.  there is a bit more to this account but time does not permit!
content.summary: Sr. usaf officer son, age 15 walking down dark street with two others, all looking at the sky. saw exeter, nh ufo!

content.detailedDescription:
I live in downtown attleboro, massachusetts. on halloween night right before 7:30 p.M. i went out on my second floor porch to breathe in some cool autumn air. the sky was clear and i could see most of the stars although there is some light pollution here. 
suddenly, traveling from from the northeast to the southwest were three lights in a boomerang shape- one light on each end and one in the middle of the craft. i would estimate that the object was only a couple of thousand feet in the air (relatively low) but was moving several hundred miles per hour and was completely silent. also the craft seemed to rotate slightly back and forth as it sped forward and then almost 90 degrees before it faded away.
content.summary: Boomerang shaped silent craft with 3 lights

content.detailedDescription: My daughter and i went out onto the porch to take photos of the rainbow after that big storm was about passed thru.  she and i were taking pictures at the same time but she caught this disc in one of her pictures.  we didn't realize what was there until we started to review on the camera the pictures she took.  i imediately down loaded them to the computer.  we were totally surprised to see this disc.  you can see the sunshine hitting the top and the shadows on the bottom so we knew it was something solid.  it didn't show up on any of my pictures on the other camera.
content.summary: Just photo of rainbows , disc showed up when downloaded

content.detailedDescription: The location was a couple of blocks from the beach. i was sitting on the deck watching the night sky, looking south across the gulf of mexico. i happened to be looking at a pair of (what i thought were) stars. they were very close together and of fairly equal brightness. as i was looking at them, they suddenly began moving away from each other, one to the east and one to the west. their acceleration was very smooth and rapid and within a few seconds they were very far apart. and then they vanished.  obviously, my first thought was that they must be airplanes. but, they had no red lights. they were both simply white, star-like dots. and, of course, airplanes don't stop in mid-air and then start flying again. i've been a stargazer for most of my life, and know the difference between shooting stars, airplanes, helicopters, etc., at night. there was no doubt in my mind that what i was witnessing was none of those. in fact, i had never seen anything like it before in my life. this was something different. very different. i'm a very skeptical and rational person, and though i do believe we are not alone in this universe, i don't watch the skies in search of aliens. i just enjoy its beauty. it's been over two years since this happened, and the effect is still profound.
content.summary: 2 white dots, close together, move apart in opposite direction, quickly

content.detailedDescription:
My grandfather, my father, and i were returning to taylor, from our farm between round rock, and hutto.  my grandfather, driving, and my father were in the front seat.  i was in the back seat trying to sleep.  

when we turned onto hwy 95 (n), from lake drive, we had driven about 1 mile when my grandfather said, "what the hell is that?", and started slowing down.  he came to a full stop, and up ahead of us, directly over the road, about 100 yards ahead, were two silver discs hovering about 3-4 feet over the road.  we watched them for about one minute, then they proceeded to the left, over some stalks of either corn, or maise.  they were only about one foot above the stalks, but there was no deflection, or sound.  they proceeded down the row of maise/corn for about 300 yards. there they stopped, then pivoted 90 degrees, to present a full, top view, and they both shot up into the air, and were out of sight in about 3 or 4 seconds.

grandfather is dead, father is dead, and i'm 72, and dying.  just thought someone should know about this, in case it ties in with any other reports.

all dates, and times are approximate.  i do remember it was a saturday, or a sunday morning, and the sun was only up for a little while and reflected off of the discs when they tilted up, and shot out of sight in the west.

i still live on the farm we we tending that morning, and remember almost the exact spot where we saw them.

plus this is all true.  i even tried to tell the newspaper in taylor, and houston, when dad and i returned to houston, but they wouldn't believe me, and didn't investigate.  if they had, my grandfather, and my father could have corroborated the event, but they didn't, and now there is only me.
content.summary: Close encounter with two disc shaped objects, metalic, 24"-36" diameter

content.detailedDescription:
Ive seen ufo's before. (i have seen objects that i was unable to explain (makeing them ufo's to me))

this was the first time i had seen one during the day. i was reclined inn the passenger seat of our car. we had just got done shopping at a store. my wife was talking to me and i was listening to her. as i was listening i was looking up in the clouds and i was enjoying how big and beautiful they looked when i saw inbetween them a oval shape reflection really far away..... now i new it wasnt a plane considering that no plane would be that high with an airport nearby, and the fact that i had seen countless planes that day and this thing seemed not to be moving ......

i watched it while my wife continued talking.... i didn't let her know about it untill it was gone because 
a. she was driveing 
b. she gets nervous from stuff like that seeing as we had been seeing ufo's all over adrian and tecumseh for 3 years now..... some of wich had chased us and or did strange things like appear right infront of us.....

anyway, as she was talking i continued to watch and just before a cloud was going to cover it up from view.... it just vanished......

my only responce to let my wife know what i had seen was me saying.....

"interesting...."

she asked me what was interesting, in which i told her.....

if interested in this case..... ask me about the other sightings ive had.... i'd like to know what i seen.....
content.summary: Small oval shine in sky during day. not moving fades from exsistance

content.detailedDescription: On the evening of october 13, 2010, i picked my teen up from dance class which gets out at 8:00 pm.  we went straight home that night so the time had to be around 8:15pm when we turned into our neighborhood.  as i turned the corner into my complex, we both caught 4 extremely bright lights in the sky just hovering.  we looked at each other with wide eyes, and asked each other, "what was that!?"  i hurried and pulled up to my garage door where we could get a good visual.  we both jumped out of the car to look up at them.  there were 4 lights that were the color of fire.  not orange like street lights, but not red like taillights either.  the amount of light that was being illuminated was not like anything we've seen before.  they had to have been huge or highly powerful.  (we see aircraft several times a day).  they were above south anchorage, just higher than the mountains, but lower than the clouds.  between o'malley, huffman, and maybe as far over as dearmoun rd.  they slowly started to move north in single file before they turned and headed west.  before they were over lake otis pkwy, the first two lights disappeared, one at a time.  the second two lights kept going for a short distance.  i had called up to my roommate to look out the window (hands were shaking to dial).  the third light disappeared and she caught sight of the fourth light before it disappeared.  we noticed that the light flickered right before they disappeared.  the "backdrop" of the sky was evening but you can still see if an airplane is flying without lights.  there was nothing. and no sound.  hot air balloons can't disappear like that nor can they produce the intensity of light that these did.  that baffled us and we cannot wrap our minds around what we saw that night.  i don't know how to find out if anyone else saw it too.
content.summary: Lights over anchorage color of fire controlled flying then vanished in mid air.

content.detailedDescription: We were driving back from nyc in november 1995.  we were heading northeast on route 17.  it was dusk like out....And while looking through the windshield......We saw an object that was hard to see its shape.  but it was large and low.  it was probably less than a thousand feet up.  but what was so striking was that the object had a glowing green discharge coming out what would appear to be the back of the craft.  it was going so slow that it didnt seem possible.  then it just kept moving across the sky and between the small hills.
content.summary: Very slow object moving across sky with glowing green discharge

content.detailedDescription:
Well me and my sister were headed to her place in moorehead from my mothers in crookston we were on highway 75 we first saw it near an air plane than with out banking or anything it started toward the highway from over by hector air  port it hovered we stopped the car didn't get out of car i think it was lost my self and we been afraid to talk about we don't want people to think we are crazy ya know i am 39 nine years old now on nov. 18 and you got to remember we got minot airforce base and grand forks air force and when it took off it was fast and didn't head into any of the nearby airforce bases it headed off to the south west and it was fast no noise but this thing was enormous bigger than 3 cars it appearea to be able to move in any direction meaning it didn't have to turn to a certain direction to fly off and it moved fast we watched it fly over to the highway wondered what the hell is this all of a sudden it was over us um that's about it good luck and keep the good work goin pretty we will be able to prove the existence more than none have seen this other worldly stuff and what i saw was other worldly it hovered over car i looked out my window rolled it down no cell phone cameras than




                      thank you,
                       *(wit's name deleted--cms/sg).


                     sorry i can't speak for my sister
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path then hovering
content.summary: Actually coolo

content.detailedDescription:
The date and time are approximates.  i was probably 12 or 13 at the time and my father had a part time job delivering pizzas in the evening at the time, and i went along with him at times.  we were making a pizza delivery to a farm house (at the time), west of the palmetto expwy (826), and north of 103 street.  approaching the house via a dirt road, heading west, we noticed a big bright light just hovering silently to our right apparenlty over a field.  my father stopped the car and i put my head out of my passenger side window to look at it.  there was no noise or anything.  after a few seconds, it quietly took off almost straight up, faster than anything earthly possible, and it left a trail of colored light behind it, which lasted for a few seconds before it dissapeared.  my father and i were in awe of what we had seen and when we got to the farm house, the people that lived there were outside talking about the same sighting and we talked about our common experience in disbelief.

i have never mentioned this to anyone but close friends and family, and since that day, there is no doubt in my mind that there is something out there with technology far more advanced that ours.

i have always wondered if there is anyone out there with a similar experience; mainly the trail of light the object left behind after it shot up into the sky, which i remember like it was yesterday.
content.summary: Big bright hovering light

content.detailedDescription: Me and a few friends were camping in a buddys backyard, they were building condomimums behind his house, and they left all the bricks in the field on pallets. i was walking across the bricks to where my friends were. as you walked you had to look down because there were spaces about a foot wide between each pallet. i was having a hard time see when suddenly i could see individual bricks. then the bricks were lit up clear as day. i looked up as fast as i could to see a round blue light wizz over my head about a thousand feet up. some of the people in the tent even came out because the light was so bright. i just heard about mufon and figured i report this anyway. theres about ten of us that saw this light and a thought someone else may have seen it and this would add to additional reports. if i ever see anything else, i will certainly report it immediatly.
content.summary: Blue,silent,very fast ball.

content.detailedDescription: On my way home looked at the large low altitude flying airplane, then looked to the north and there was a bright silver orb/object flying steadily from south to north direction. took a picture of it with my cellphone.
content.summary: Silver orb flying across the sky at the same time as a low flying large airplane.

content.detailedDescription:
I was sitting in my yard watching a hawk flying over, then i saw an object moving very fast toward the mountain top. i got a picture but it was moving so fast it blurred the picture. i have seen many of these things here. 
if you keep close watch you can see one every day. there is no sound, no jet stream, and they move in and out slow or very fast.
sometimes they use the very same path. the last pic i posted was near the same point this one was. there is only one in this photo, but there are many in this area.
someone needs to be checking them out. there may be a surprising turn of events in getting the attention of someone who knows about ufo,s.
looking at the picture you will see a white dot, and when you magnify it it will be blurred, but it is not a cloud, nor a bird. with the naked eye it is in the shape of a pill, it is white, and looks like a craft of some kind. the picture does not do it justice.
content.summary: Pill shaped object moving very fast over the mountain.
